data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus nigra (Black pine) from sample TROF-11

Exposition N, Slope 20 deg, Geology: Grobblock. Serpentinschutt, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 2%, Vegatation type: Feucht. tiefg. Fö-Stao. Waldgrenze. St. wexp. , Film number: 633A
